daily_activities: Arrival in Reykjavik
Visit Hallgrimskirkja church
Explore Laugavegur shopping street
Dinner at a traditional Icelandic restaurant
Golden Circle tour (Thingvellir, Geysir, Gullfoss)
Snorkeling or scuba diving in Silfra Fissure
Visit the Blue Lagoon for relaxation
Hiking in Skaftafell National Park
Visit the glacier lagoon Jokulsarlon
Take a boat tour among floating icebergs
Drive to Vik and explore the black sand beach
Visit the nearby waterfalls of Skogafoss and Seljalandsfoss
Hike to the glacial tongue of Solheimajokull
Adventure sports: glacier hiking or ice climbing
Visit the nearby town of Hofn
Dinner at a local restaurant
Drive to Egilsstadir and explore the eastern fjords
Visit the Petra's Stone Collection museum
Hike in the beautiful Eastfjords
Visit the stunning Godafoss waterfall
Explore the lake Myvatn and its unique landscapes
Soak in the geothermal pool of Jarbodin
Horseback riding tour in the Icelandic countryside
Visit a local farm and learn about Icelandic agriculture
Dinner at a farm-to-table restaurant
Visit the Settlement Exhibition museum in Reykjavik
Explore the Harpa concert hall and its unique architecture
Nightlife: visit the bars and clubs of Reykjavik
Day trip to the Snaefellsnes Peninsula
Visit the picturesque towns of Arnarstapi and Hellnar
Hike to the beautiful glacier of Oxnadalur
Visit the National Museum of Iceland
Explore the Reykjavik Art Museum
Shopping: visit the Laugavegur shopping street
Adventure sports: paragliding or skydiving
Visit the nearby town of Akureyri
Dinner at a local restaurant
Visit the stunning Dettifoss waterfall
Explore the unique landscapes of the Diamond Circle
Hike in the beautiful Asbyrgi canyon
Relaxation day: visit a geothermal pool or spa
Shopping: visit the local markets and boutiques
Farewell dinner at a traditional Icelandic restaurant
Departure from Reykjavik
Last-minute shopping or sightseeing
Flight back home

travel_instructions.route_details: From Ahmedabad, take a flight to a major European hub like London (LHR) or Amsterdam (AMS), then connect to a flight to Keflavik International Airport (KEF) in Iceland. Possible airlines include Emirates, Lufthansa, or Icelandair.
